ComicInfo.Summary:
Bullets darken the sky as this epic series arc concludes with this blood-stained issue. Brimstone has been overrun by fl eshwalkers. Now only three survivors remain and their leader Victor, the Viper, is infected. How long he can hold out before turning is anyone's guess, but time has nearly run out. Survival of the group will mean sacrifi ce of one of their own. Or maybe it's already too late.
